# additionalActions

**Instance Property**

The actions that can be taken on a notification in addition to the default action.

## Declaration

```swift
var additionalActions: [NSUserNotificationAction]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This array contains `NSUserNotificationAction` objects that describe the different actions for a notification in addition to the default action described by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification/actionButtonTitle].

## Related Documentation

- **otherButtonTitle**: Specifies a custom title for the close button in an alert-style notification.
- **actionButtonTitle**: Specifies the title of the action button displayed in the notification.

## User Notification Activation Method

- **activationType**: Specifies what caused a user notification to occur.
- **additionalActivationAction**: An additional action selected by the user.
